resources.string: This App allows you to put your phone on silent based on day and time. To get started press menu on the main screen and select Add Profile. Profiles are displayed on the main screen. To remove a profile press on it and select yes to remove. - If you have any Problems or issues with this App please do not hesitate to contact me. When sending an email please include the App Name, Version number and a description of the problem. Also feel free to contact me for feature requests and suggestions.
Choose the start time for when you want your phone to go into silent mode
Choose an end time for when you want your phone to come back out of silent mode
When you are happy with the settings press save profile
